Description: Cuisinart's electric knife is really two knives in one with full-size interchangeable bread and carving blades in high-grade stainless steel. Knife handle is ergonomically designed to work comfortably when held in the right or left hand. Set comes with a becoming wooden butcher block storage unit with blade lock-ins for added safety. Includes 4-foot cord, one-touch on/off trigger. Knife blades are dishwasher safe.
Name: Cuisinart CEK-40 Electric Knife
